main event: Observers at Fort Bliss, Texas, reported a sighting of a flashing silver object in the sky on 19 May 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5 minutes and appeared the size of a thumbnail at arm's length,The object moved away at an angle of approximately 100Â° and descending,It exhibited irregular rolling and tilting maneuvers while moving,No sound or trail was reported during the sighting,The weather conditions were bright and sunny with no clouds, making visibility clear.
witness description: Soldiers from the 39th Anti-Aircraft Artillery Battalion
